name: Record
tagline: test record js - record, time, stop, play
body:
1. download the source code (zip)
2. upzip to local
3. open html file with a modern browser (recommend chrome)
4. click the record button
5. allow flash 
6. make some voice and stop
7. play your record
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
